    • newChromeDriver

      public LaunchedChromeDriver newChromeDriver(UserProfile userProfile, ChromeDriverFactory.UserDataAccess instruction) throws IOException, WebDriverFactoryException
      create a new instance of ChromeDriver using the UserProfile specified.

      If UserDataAccess.CLONE_TO_TEMP is given, create a temporary directory as the replacement of "User-data" folder into which the profile directory of the given userProfile is cloned from the original. Effectively we can open 2 or more Chrome browsers using the same user profile while no IOException due to contention to the "User-data" folder. However, please note, that all cookies etc stored in the temporary directory wll be discarded when the browser is closed; therefore the cookies won't be retained.

      If UserDataAccess.LOCK_USER_DATA is given, the default "User-data" will be used. When a Chrome using the same user profile has been opened and are still present, then the "User-data" folder is locked; hence a contention will occur. invalid argument: user data directory is already in use, please specify a unique value for --user-data-dir argument, or don't use --user-data-dir In this case, you have to close the elder Chrome browser, and try again.

      定義:
      newChromeDriver クラス内 ChromeDriverFactory
      パラメータ:
      userProfile - e.g. new com.kazurayam.webdriverfactory.UserProfile("Alice")
      instruction - default to UserDataAccess.CLONE_TO_TEMP
      戻り値:
      a ChromeDriver object; Chrome browser will be opened.
      例外:
      IOException
      WebDriverFactoryException

    • newChromeDriver
